articles.author: Barak Ravid, Colin Demarest
articles.title: Trump sends second aircraft carrier to Gulf amid Iran threats - Axios
articles.description: America's largest warship is heading to the Gulf.
articles.content: <ul><li>The Ford, which is now in the Caribbean, will need three or four weeks to arrive in the region. That's in line with the timeline Trump mentioned on Thursday, when he claimed he wanted to fina… [+2460 chars]
